scripts.build-all: npm run cdk-clear-context && ts-node ./helpers/commands.ts "npm run build"
scripts.build-all-backend: npm run cdk-clear-context && ts-node ./helpers/commands.ts "npm run build" "backend"
scripts.build-all-frontend: npm run cdk-clear-context && ts-node ./helpers/commands.ts "npm run build" "frontend"
scripts.cinstall-all: npm i && npm run cdk-clear-context && ts-node ./helpers/commands.ts "npm ci"
scripts.cinstall-all-backend: npm i && npm run cdk-clear-context && ts-node ./helpers/commands.ts "npm ci" "backend"
scripts.cinstall-all-frontend: npm i && npm run cdk-clear-context && ts-node ./helpers/commands.ts "npm ci" "frontend"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run build-all && ts-node ./helpers/deploy.ts
